ygData.subject: Re: Hymn n' DoTs
ygData.msgSnippet: Now why should I worry about that?  How many times am I going to DoT myself :p  I meant as far as mobs DoTing you.  Besides, I think that is what the problem
ygData.messageBody:
Now why should I worry about that? How many times am I going to DoT
myself :p I meant as far as mobs DoTing you. Besides, I think that
is what the problem was anyways. People would DoT themselves and
then stack Regens. Maybe they only changed it for self inflicted
DoT's? Not sure. All I am saying is, that you don't have to worry
about getting a DoT in combat and Hymn not counter acting it.

~Beatdrop Battledrum
47th Bard of the Karana Server


--- In eqbards@egroups.com, Elijah Meeker <emeeker@m...> wrote:
> > Hymn was not affected by this nerf.
>
>
> We were effected: Target yourself and sing Fufil's, once it sticks
sing
> hymn, the hymn icon will not appear until fufil's has worn off.
>
> Tszaaz
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
